title: Dawoud Bey: Night Coming Tenderly, Black
short_description: Dawoud Bey’s latest body of work is a series of black-and-white photographs that reimagine sites along the last stages of the Underground Railroad.
artwork_titles: Shiloh National Military Park, Pittsburgh Landing, Tennessee
Clearing Land, Ellis Unit, from the series "Conversations with the Dead" and No. 13 from the portfolio "Danny Lyon" (1979)
Aspens, Dawn, Dolores River Canyon, Autumn, Colorado

Dutch Gap Canal, James River, Virginia
Black and Tanned Your Whipped Wind of Change Howled Low Blowing Itself - Ha - Smack into the Middle of Duke Ellington's Orchestra Billie Heard It Too & Cried Strange Fruit Tears

input: Dawoud Bey: Night Coming Tenderly, Black
